data.name: A bit about Australia's favourite juice and smoothie bar
data.value: A bit about Australia's favourite juice and smoothie bar

data.name: A love for life infuses everything we do
data.value: A love for life infuses everything we do

data.name: About Boost Juice
data.value: About Boost Juice

data.name: Back in 2000, a woman with no business experience – but unlimited passion and family support – opened her first juice bar in Adelaide.
data.value: Back in 2000, a woman with no business experience – but unlimited passion and family support – opened her first juice bar in Adelaide.

data.name: Boost from the beginning.
data.value: Boost from the beginning.

data.name: Boost Juice has come a long way from its humble beginnings. But one thing hasn’t changed – our commitment to health, fun and loving life.
data.value: Boost Juice has come a long way from its humble beginnings. But one thing hasn’t changed – our commitment to health, fun and loving life.

data.name: But hard work is often rewarded, and the success of the first King William St store allowed Janine and Jeff to open three new sites – including two in one day.
data.value: But hard work is often rewarded, and the success of the first King William St store allowed Janine and Jeff to open three new sites – including two in one day.

data.name: But there’s no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
data.value: But there’s no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.

data.name: Choose drink type
data.value: Choose drink type

data.name: Contact Us
data.value: Contact us

data.name: Do you hate waiting? Do you like things really fast? Are you becoming impatient waiting for us to make our point? Well wait no more! When you become a Vibe member, you get to cut the queue forever when you order through the App! Vibe members get a ton of free stuff and all you have to do is register.
data.value: Do you hate waiting? Do you like things really fast? Are you becoming impatient waiting for us to make our point? Well wait no more! When you become a Vibe member, you get to cut the queue forever when you order through the App! Vibe members get a ton of free stuff and all you have to do is register.

data.name: Faced with the juice shop job and not being able to sell juice, the team had to rush to Australian retail department store Myer to buy domestic juicers. All were damaged after just a day of use, but before the new equipment was brought in, the job was finally completed. These barriers are for us to overcome.
data.value: Faced with the juice shop job and not being able to sell juice, the team had to rush to Australian retail department store Myer to buy domestic juicers. All were damaged after just a day of use, but before the new equipment was brought in, the job was finally completed. These barriers are for us to overcome.

data.name: Growing Strong
data.value: Growing Strong

data.name: If we can help people eat more fruits and vegetables by making them taste delicious, the results are great. But we don't just want to bring our customers delicious smoothies and juices, we also want to share our energy, passion and "love of life" through spontaneous experiences. at store.
data.value: If we can help people eat more fruits and vegetables by making them taste delicious, the results are great. But we don't just want to bring our customers delicious smoothies and juices, we also want to share our energy, passion and "love of life" through spontaneous experiences. at store.

data.name: It’s a philosophy that has taken us far. Building one of Australia’s most well-loved brands was never going to be easy. But thanks to a positive outlook, hard work and the help of extraordinary people, Boost has grown to over 580 stores worldwide.
data.value: It’s a philosophy that has taken us far. Building one of Australia’s most well-loved brands was never going to be easy. But thanks to a positive outlook, hard work and the help of extraordinary people, Boost has grown to over 580 stores worldwide.

data.name: Janine and husband Jeff developed a retail concept different to anything the world had seen before. Founded on Janine's 'love life' philosophy, Boost Juice would offer a unique customer experience around happy, healthy living and delicious products.
data.value: Janine and husband Jeff developed a retail concept different to anything the world had seen before. Founded on Janine's 'love life' philosophy, Boost Juice would offer a unique customer experience around happy, healthy living and delicious products.

data.name: Juices & Smoothies
data.value: Juices & Smoothies

data.name: Just one problem: the banks wouldn’t touch a business that just sold liquid. But as they say, when life hands you lemons, make lemonade. Or juices and smoothies, as the case may be.
data.value: Just one problem: the banks wouldn’t touch a business that just sold liquid. But as they say, when life hands you lemons, make lemonade. Or juices and smoothies, as the case may be.

data.name: Just three years later, Janine purchased rival chain Viva Juice and sold the rebranded stores to franchise partners.
data.value: Just three years later, Janine purchased rival chain Viva Juice and sold the rebranded stores to franchise partners.

data.value: Learn More

data.name: News
data.value: News

data.name: Oh you little hipster thing you! If tech is too cool at the moment, then scoot on over to your nearest Boost store, get yourself a Vibe card and register your details. Do it quickly before it becomes mainstream.
data.value: Oh you little hipster thing you! If tech is too cool at the moment, then scoot on over to your nearest Boost store, get yourself a Vibe card and register your details. Do it quickly before it becomes mainstream.

data.name: On a trip to the United States back in 1999, something caught Janine's attention. Everyone was into healthy smoothies and fresh juices - while in Australia, the fast food market was uninspiring and unhealthy. Janine had just had her third son and, like many young mothers, wanted more flexibility to run her own race..
data.value: On a trip to the United States back in 1999, something caught Janine's attention. Everyone was into healthy smoothies and fresh juices - while in Australia, the fast food market was uninspiring and unhealthy. Janine had just had her third son and, like many young mothers, wanted more flexibility to run her own race..

data.name: Operating from her kitchen table in Melbourne, Janine consulted nutritionists and naturopaths to create a menu free from preservatives and artificial colours and flavourings.
data.value: Operating from her kitchen table in Melbourne, Janine consulted nutritionists and naturopaths to create a menu free from preservatives and artificial colours and flavourings.

data.name: Our primary life requires energy. This philosophy inspires everything we do. And as we continually innovate and grow, it's not with the goal of changing the world, but just to make our customers feel “a little better.”
data.value: Our primary life requires energy. This philosophy inspires everything we do. And as we continually innovate and grow, it's not with the goal of changing the world, but just to make our customers feel “a little better.”

data.value: Sign In

data.name: Sometimes, the best way to learn is to jump in at the deep end, and that’s exactly what happened next. Janine and Jeff signed on for 28 leases at Westfield Shopping Centres. It meant a personal liability of over $5 million and a deadline to open every store in just 18 months. Thanks to sheer determination and amazing franchise partners, it happened on time and on budget.
data.value: Sometimes, the best way to learn is to jump in at the deep end, and that’s exactly what happened next. Janine and Jeff signed on for 28 leases at Westfield Shopping Centres. It meant a personal liability of over $5 million and a deadline to open every store in just 18 months. Thanks to sheer determination and amazing franchise partners, it happened on time and on budget.

data.name: The Boost Juice Story
data.value: The Boost Juice Story

data.name: The idea was brilliantly simple: make healthy living tasty and fun.
data.value: The idea was brilliantly simple: make healthy living tasty and fun.

data.name: The list of awards is increasing day by day. In December 2015, Boost Juice achieved three awards with the Australian Franchise Council and Janine was inducted into the Hall of Fame. The brand also received awards for Australian Franchise of the Year, Outstanding International Franchise and NT/QLD Regional Franchise.
data.value: The list of awards is increasing day by day. In December 2015, Boost Juice achieved three awards with the Australian Franchise Council and Janine was inducted into the Hall of Fame. The brand also received awards for Australian Franchise of the Year, Outstanding International Franchise and NT/QLD Regional Franchise.

data.name: The woman was Australian adventurer and entrepreneur Janine Allis. The bar was Boost Juice – now one of the most popular and loved juice and smoothie brands across the globe, with over 500 stores across 13 different countries and counting.
data.value: The woman was Australian adventurer and entrepreneur Janine Allis. The bar was Boost Juice – now one of the most popular and loved juice and smoothie brands across the globe, with over 500 stores across 13 different countries and counting.

data.name: They say success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration. And who’s going to argue with that? Little did Janine know that her plan to not work a 40-hour week would actually mean working a 100-hour week, with no money coming in for a good three years.
data.value: They say success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration. And who’s going to argue with that? Little did Janine know that her plan to not work a 40-hour week would actually mean working a 100-hour week, with no money coming in for a good three years.

data.name: This is the best club you will ever join. It's more glamorous than Mariah Carey's life, with hundreds more hidden benefits than the Illuminati, and if you download our BOOST app you'll be inundated with freebies and sweet deals. sweet for the rest of your life…. or until you lose your card or delete this app.
data.value: This is the best club you will ever join. It's more glamorous than Mariah Carey's life, with hundreds more hidden benefits than the Illuminati, and if you download our BOOST app you'll be inundated with freebies and sweet deals. sweet for the rest of your life…. or until you lose your card or delete this app.

data.name: Today, the world can’t get enough of Boost Juice. The brand’s winning combination of fresh fruit and veg, tasty products and innovative marketing campaigns has been a remarkable success story.
data.value: Today, the world can’t get enough of Boost Juice. The brand’s winning combination of fresh fruit and veg, tasty products and innovative marketing campaigns has been a remarkable success story.

data.name: Unsurprisingly, Boost Juice was voted one of the most admired franchises in Australia. Janine was named Telstra Businesswoman of the Year and, a year later, in 2005, Boost Juice received the American Express Franchisor of the Year award.
data.value: Unsurprisingly, Boost Juice was voted one of the most admired franchises in Australia. Janine was named Telstra Businesswoman of the Year and, a year later, in 2005, Boost Juice received the American Express Franchisor of the Year award.

data.name: Wellbeing
data.value: Wellbeing

data.name: Your phone just got smarter! From the convenience of your fingers (or toes if you’re talented like that) you can order and customise your Boost from the App and strut your stuff past any queues. If that’s not enough, we give so much stuff away you’d think we we’re having a closing down sale! Which we aren’t. We’re here forever.
data.value: Your phone just got smarter! From the convenience of your fingers (or toes if you’re talented like that) you can order and customise your Boost from the App and strut your stuff past any queues. If that’s not enough, we give so much stuff away you’d think we we’re having a closing down sale! Which we aren’t. We’re here forever.

data.name:
“Boost has a can-do attitude. We don’t believe in the word ‘try’ because that means I’ll give myself permission to not succeed. You don’t try. You just do it.”
Janine Allis
data.value:

Janine Allis

data.name: “The vision was simple: every customer will leave a Boost Juice store feeling just that little bit better.”
